articles.title: Exploits of Kim Il Sung praised
Film shows on Sun's Day
articles.content:
Film shows on Sun's Day
   Pyongyang, April 13 (KCNA) -- The Foreign Ministry of the DPRK and the Korean Committee for Cultural Relations with Foreign Countries on Monday sponsored film shows each on the occasion of Sun's Day.   Invited were diplomatic envoys and officials in charge of culture and friendly relations of foreign embassies in Korea.   Present were Foreign Minister Paek Nam Sun and vice-chairman of the Korean Committee for Cultural Relations with Foreign Countries Ri Song Ho and other officials concerned.   The participants saw Korean documentary films "Great Life in 1994" showing the revolutionary activities of the President Kim Il Sung in the last period of his life and "Festival of glory which was grandly celebrated amid wishes of the world people."

articles.title: Foreign embassy officials visit cultural exhibition
articles.content:
Foreign embassy officials visit cultural exhibition
    Pyongyang, April 13 (KCNA) -- Officials in charge of culture and friendly relations of foreign embassies in Korea visited the Pyongyang cultural exhibition on Monday on the occasion of Sun's Day.    They looked round photos showing immortal leadership exploits of the President Kim Il Sung and General Secretary  Kim Jong Il, famous works authored by them and Korean books and handiwork.

articles.title: Trolley bus "Sonyonho" presented
articles.content:
Trolley bus "Sonyonho" presented
    Pyongyang, April 13 (KCNA) -- School children across the country presented extra-large trolley buses  "Sonyonho" on the occasion of the 87th birth anniversary of the President Kim Il Sung.   They presented 10 trolley buses in hearty response to the intention of General Secretary  Kim Jong Il to make traffic more convenient for the citizens of the capital.   A presentation meeting was held on Monday.   Secretary of the Central Committee of the Worker's Party of Korea Kim Jung Rin and others were present there.

articles.title: Friendly meeting hosted by Chinese ambassador
articles.content:
Friendly meeting hosted by Chinese ambassador
    Pyongyang, April 13 (KCNA) -- Chinese ambassador to Korea Wan Yongxiang organized a friendly meeting at the embassy on Monday as regards the 17th April Spring Friendship Art Festival.    Present on invitation were chairman Jang Chol of the festival organizing committee and officials concerned.    On hand were Chinese artistes participating in the festival and Chinese embassy officials.

articles.title: Gift to Kim Jong Il from Chinese delegation
articles.content:
Gift to Kim Jong Il from Chinese delegation 
    Pyongyang, April 13 (KCNA) -- General Secretary  Kim Jong Il received a gift from the Chinese government cultural delegation.  It was handed to an official concerned by vice-Minister of Culture Ai Qingchun, head of the delegation on a visit to Korea.

articles.title: Peruvian political party leader here
articles.content:
Peruvian political party leader here
    Pyongyang, April 13 (KCNA) -- Alberto Moreno, general secretary of the c.c., Communist Party of Peru (Red Motherland), arrived here on Monday with the approach of the birth anniversary of the President Kim Il Sung.

articles.title: Sun's Day commemorated
articles.content:
Sun's Day commemorated
   Pyongyang, April 13 (KCNA) -- Commemorations of  Sun's Day, the birthday of the President Kim Il Sung, are going on in the DPRK.   A national  loyal singing get-together of youth vanguard,  an agricultural worker's public presentation of the President's virtues, a singing get-together to praise sun "our leader" and a joint national performance of art circles of the women's union were held in Pyongyang on Monday.   The performers lauded the enduring revolutionary feats performed by the President, the father of socialist Korea and the eternal sun of Juche.      They represented the faith and  will of the Korean people to bring about the eternal prosperity of the sun's nation under the leadership of General Secretary  Kim Jong Il as well as their life full of confidence and optimism.

Talks between Choe Thae Bok and Peruvian political party leader
articles.content:
Talks between Choe Thae Bok and Peruvian political party leader
   Pyongyang, April 13 (KCNA) -- Talks between Choe Thae Bok, secretary of the C.C., the Worker's Party of Korea, and Alberto Moreno, general secretary of the c.c., the Communist Party of Peru (Red Motherland), were held here today.   At the talks both sides informed each other of their party  activities and exchanged views on the issue of developing friendly relations between the two parties  and a number of matters of mutual concern.
